text: He tells a story that a humpback, listening to a preacher, found it hard to believe him about the perfection of God's work. As he was going out, Paul said to Paul, "You are a man of God, and everything is fine. But look at what I am!" The preacher examined him for a moment and said, "But, my friend, what are you complaining about?" It's very well made to be humped! FIN French Anonymous
title: Lección dada a un jorobado
author: nan Anónimo
